bestIdea.name: Amazon River Expedition
bestIdea.description: A journey through the heart of the Amazon Rainforest, following the course of the Amazon River. Experience the diverse ecosystems, from dense jungle to open riverbanks, and encounter unique wildlife and indigenous cultures.

otherIdeas.name: Congo River Adventure
otherIdeas.description: Traverse the Congo River, the second longest river in Africa, through the dense and mysterious Congo Rainforest. Discover the rich biodiversity and the vibrant cultures along the riverbanks.

possibleSteps.startingLocation: Kisangani, Democratic Republic of the Congo
possibleSteps.endingLocation: Mbandaka, Democratic Republic of the Congo

possibleSteps.startingLocation: Mbandaka, Democratic Republic of the Congo
possibleSteps.endingLocation: Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo

possibleSteps.startingLocation: Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo
possibleSteps.endingLocation: Matadi, Democratic Republic of the Congo

possibleSteps.startingLocation: Matadi, Democratic Republic of the Congo

otherIdeas.name: Borneo Rainforest Trek
otherIdeas.description: Explore the lush rainforests of Borneo, home to diverse wildlife including orangutans and pygmy elephants. The trek covers various national parks and conservation areas.

otherIdeas.name: Sumatra Jungle Journey
otherIdeas.description: Venture into the rainforests of Sumatra, Indonesia, known for their rich biodiversity and endangered species like the Sumatran tiger and rhinoceros.

possibleSteps.endingLocation: Bukit Barisan Selatan National Park, Indonesia

possibleSteps.startingLocation: Bukit Barisan Selatan National Park, Indonesia
